TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebSuccessAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供成功的安全性事件之相關資訊。

span.span: Provides information about successful security events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料，並負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康狀態事件類型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 成功的安全性相關作業發生時，會使用類別。The class is used when a successful security-related operation occurs. 這個範例是 Web 要求成功的 URL 授權。An example of this is a successful URL authorization for a Web request. 下列清單說明哪些事件類型的功能由 ASP.NET 所引發：The following list describes the features for which events of type are raised by ASP.NET: - 檔案授權。File Authorization. 稽核成功的條件。Successful conditions are audited. 與要求相關聯的 Windows 身分識別時，ASP.NET 只會嘗試檔案授權。File authorization is only attempted by ASP.NET when a Windows Identity is associated with the request. 相關的事件的稽核程式碼是。The related event audit code is . - URL 授權。URL Authorization. 它表示授權授與的 URL 資源的存取。It signifies access of a URL resource for which authorization is granted. 稽核成功的條件。Successful conditions are audited. 相關的事件的稽核程式碼是。The related event audit code is . - 其他安全性狀況。Other security conditions. 以下是相關的事件代碼的清單：The following is a list of the related event codes: - - 當會引發，ASP.NET 健康監視遞增相關的稽核成功事件引發的效能計數器，然後檢查`healthMonitoring`設定才能決定是否將任何提供者，訂閱事件。When a is raised, ASP.NET health monitoring increments the related Audit Success Events Raised performance counter and then checks the `healthMonitoring` configuration to determine whether any providers subscribe to the event. 如果提供者訂閱事件時，ASP.NET 會分派處理它們的事件。If providers subscribe to the event, ASP.NET dispatches the event to them for processing. > [!NOTE] > 若要檢視引發的稽核成功事件中的效能計數器系統監視器 (PerfMon)，在**新增計數器**視窗中選取**ASP.NET**從**效能物件**下拉式清單中，選取**稽核成功事件引發**效能計數器，然後按一下**新增** 按鈕。To view the Audit Success Event Raised performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the **Audit Success Event Raised** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 監視 ASP.NET 應用程式效能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c96da1d1-6077-48d3-88e2-d9127ed91cf5)。For more information, see [Monitoring ASP.NET Application Performance](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c96da1d1-6077-48d3-88e2-d9127ed91cf5). 成功稽核代表預期的情況，因為您可能不想要訂閱這些事件。Because success audits represent an expected condition, you may not want to subscribe to them. 您可以訂閱它們以提供站台的稽核的存取權。You can subscribe to them in order to provide access auditing for the site. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例的衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂的稽核事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom audit event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/CS/websuccessauditevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/VB/websuccessauditevent.vb#1)] 下列範例是組態檔，可讓 ASP.NET 健康監視，以使用事件的摘要。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET health monitoring to use the event. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 狀況監控系統是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來具現化物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己的事件類型繼承自這個類別時。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以呼叫建構函式，若是衍生自類別。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式中`SampleWebSuccessAuditEvent`類別。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebSuccessAuditEvent` class. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/CS/websuccessauditevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/VB/websuccessauditevent.vb#2)]

protected public: WebSuccessAuditEvent(System::String ^ message, System::Object ^ eventSource, int eventCode, int eventDetailCode);

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 狀況監控系統是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來具現化物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己的事件類型繼承自這個類別時。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以呼叫建構函式，若是衍生自類別。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式中`SampleWebSuccessAuditEvent`類別。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebSuccessAuditEvent` class. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/CS/websuccessauditevent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent/VB/websuccessauditevent.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void IncrementPerfCounters() cil managed

summary.span: 遞增 [引發的稽核成功事件] 效能計數器。

span.span: Increments the Audit Success Events Raised performance counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 稽核成功事件引發的效能計數器會追蹤成功的應用程式啟動後所引發的稽核事件。The Audit Success Events Raised performance counter tracks the number of successful audit events raised since the application started. 這個方法也會呼叫父方法，這個方法會遞增 引發的事件計數器。This method also calls the parent method, which increments the Events Raised counter. 此計數器會追蹤所引發的事件總數。This counter tracks the total number of events raised. 若要檢視在 [系統監視器 (PerfMon)，這些效能計數器**新增計數器**視窗中選取**ASP.NET**從**效能物件**下拉式清單中，選取您想要檢視，然後按一下效能計數器**新增**] 按鈕。To view these performance counters in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the performance counter you want to view, and click the **Add** button. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 監視 ASP.NET 應用程式效能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c96da1d1-6077-48d3-88e2-d9127ed91cf5)。For more information, see [Monitoring ASP.NET Application Performance](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c96da1d1-6077-48d3-88e2-d9127ed91cf5).
